sentences.cn: 脸上坚毅沉着,仿佛相信命中早已注定.

sentences.en: Brief style and contrast color application imperturbable, introverted and young quality.
sentences.cn: 简洁的款式,稍撞色的缉线,使款式看起来既显得沉着 、 内敛,又不失年轻活力.

sentences.en: Brief style shows imperturbable, introverted and individual quality.
sentences.cn: 简洁的款式,显得沉着 、 内敛,但不失个性.

sentences.en: Brief style shows imperturbable, introverted and individual quality. It is much suitable and comfortable for body.
sentences.cn: 简洁的款式,显得沉着 、 内敛,但不失个性. 版型合体,穿着舒适.

sentences.en: Decide you can do the Method and be imperturbable.
sentences.cn: 决定你能使用这个方法并且达到不受侵扰的安宁状态.

sentences.en: Edward was a model of good temper and his equanimity imperturbable.
sentences.cn: 爱德华是个典型的好性子,他总是沉着镇定.

sentences.en: He remained imperturbable in spite of the hysteria and panic all around him.
sentences.cn: 尽管他周围的人歇斯底里地惊慌失措,但他仍保持冷静.

sentences.en: Hitherto imperturbable, he now showed signs of alarm.
sentences.cn: 虽然迄今为止一直泰然自若, 但他现在表现出一些惊慌.

sentences.en: Only by reading between the lines can one follow the unsparing analysis beneath the imperturbable surface.
sentences.cn: 只有从字里行间体会言外之意,读者才能理解在不动声色的表面底下隐藏着的毫不留情的分析.

sentences.en: She was almost renowned in the congregation for this imperturbable veracity.
sentences.cn: 她因那种无可动摇的诚信,在教会里几乎是有口皆碑的.
她是不可动摇的, 不可理解的, 不可捉摸的.

sentences.en: She was one of those imperturbable people who never get angry or upset.
sentences.cn: 她是那种从不生气也不烦恼的人.

sentences.en: The Doctor's indignation was wholly lost on his imperturbable rival.
sentences.cn: 医生的愤慨对于他的泰然自若的敌手也是毫无作用.

sentences.en: Thomas, of course, was cool and aloof and imperturbable.
sentences.cn: 当然，托马斯沉着、冷漠，不易激动。

sentences.en: Wu Sun - fu listened attentively, while his eyes scanned Tu Weiyueh's imperturbable face.
sentences.cn: 吴荪甫很注意地听着, 眼光在屠维岳那冷静的脸上打圈子.

trans.tran_cn: 不易兴奋的，不易激动的，沉着的，镇静的
trans.tran_en: remaining calm and unworried in spite of problems or difficulties
